description.p: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
You may use a reaction to heal an ally within 15 feet of yourself for [2d6+level]

sheet.description: Heal an ally within 15 feet of yourself for 2d6+{{level}} hp.

description.p: Set your shield on fire, whenever you are hit, the attacker makes a constitution save. If they fail, they take 2d6 damage.

sheet.description: Set your shield on fire, whenever you are hit, the attacker makes a constitution save. If they fail, they take 2d6 damage.
You have an aura of authority that extends to 30 feet. Allies within this radius gain advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed.
You can use a bonus action to rally your crew. All friendly creatures within 60 feet gain {{rallying shout:hp:temp}} temporary hit points.
You can use an action to magically heal a creature you touch. The target regains hit points equal to 1d8 + {{wisdom:modifier}}.
Once per turn, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to your ranged weapon attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the damage dealt.
In good weather conditions, you can rechart your ship's course in the blink of an eye. This allows your ship to reroll any failed navigational check during the journey.
When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against that creature.
